creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: rainbow border; violent, colorful imagery throughout; hanged figure with green face, rainbow bulging eyeball and a large, purple glove on PR hand; cartoonish figure in black and white pigments being shot with a bullet in C right; burning flames in URQ and ULQ; gray truck in center; pig-like face wearing a witch's hat, with hearts for eyes, sticking out tongue in bottom center
medium: Colored pencil and ink on paper
provenance: The artist, New York; (George Adams Gallery, New York, sold to Mersky, July 2020: Robert B. Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2020.
signed: LRC, in margin, in pencil: CRUZ AZACETA | LRC, in silver pigment: LCA
title: La Mano Blanca
